    Calculate baseline emissions (Equation 2)

    calculate_baseline_emissions.Rd

    Implements Equation (2) of AMS-I.B by multiplying the baseline energy content by the applicable fossil fuel emission factor.

    calculate_baseline_emissions(
  energy_data,
  energy_col = "baseline_energy_mj",
  emission_factor,
  output_col = "baseline_emissions_tco2e"
)

    Arguments

    energy_data

    A tibble, typically the output of calculate_baseline_energy_content().

    energy_col

    Name of the column containing baseline energy in MJ.

    emission_factor

    Baseline emission factor in tCO2e/MJ. Supply either a single value applied to all rows or a vector matching the number of rows.

    output_col

    Name of the resulting column containing baseline emissions in tCO2e.

    Value

    A tibble with baseline emissions in tCO2e.

    Examples

    baseline_energy <- tibble::tibble(baseline_energy_mj = c(10000, 12000))
calculate_baseline_emissions(baseline_energy, emission_factor = 0.00007)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 2
#>   baseline_energy_mj baseline_emissions_tco2e
#>                <dbl>                    <dbl>
#> 1              10000                     0.7 
#> 2              12000                     0.84
